channel.title: Alright Server
channel.description:
[center][font=impact][size=36pt]eh its okay ;)[/size][/font][/center]
[b]Awesome server, im the owner --- IGN : Santa I spend day and night over 10 hours a day working on the server. It's been up for a week and me and my co-owner have gotten an excessive amount done!! [size=14pt]EVERYDAY THE SERVER IS BEING IMPROVED [/size] Last but not least, our members :) we need dedicated members who will play daily We are looking for staff but DONT TAKE STAFF HUNTERS -- [size=14pt]HIGH SCORES ADDED :)[/size][/b]
[size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Website[/shadow] --[/size] [url=http://www.Chaotic-Rush.webs.com]www.Chaotic-Rush.webs.com[/url] [size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Webclient[/shadow] --[/size] [url=http://www.chaotic-rush.uphero.com]www.chaotic-rush.uphero.com[/url] [size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Downloat[/shadow] --[/size] [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/93087575/client.jar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/93087575/client.jar[/url]

item.title: Alright Server
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

I spend over 15 hours a day on my server, mainly creating new classes and then deleting them because I think I’ve failed.

This is like something I would create and then delete. I haven’t deleted it because I don’t know I could do something good with it.

[code=java]package org.dementhium.content;

import org.dementhium.model.player.Player;
import org.dementhium.model.Item;
import org.dementhium.model.definition.ItemDefinition;
import org.dementhium.event.EventListener;
import org.dementhium.event.EventManager;

/**

  • @author Wildking72
    */
    public class ChaoticManager {

    private transient Player player;
    private static ChaoticManager chaotics = new ChaoticManager();

    public static ChaoticManager getChaoticManager() {
    return chaotics;
    }

    private static int MAX_CHARGES = 10000;

    public static Object[][] CHAOTICS = new Object[][] {
    {18349, 18350, MAX_CHARGES},
    {18351, 18352, MAX_CHARGES},
    {18353, 18354, MAX_CHARGES},
    {18355, 183556, MAX_CHARGES},
    {18357, 18358, MAX_CHARGES}
    };

    public int getCharge(int object) {
    return (int) CHAOTICS[object][2];
    }

    public int getBrokenChaotic(int object) {
    return (int) CHAOTICS[object][1];
    }

    public int getNewChaotic(int object) {
    return (int) CHAOTICS[object][0];
    }

    public void setCharge(int item, int charge) {
    this.CHAOTICS[item][2] = charge;
    this.CHAOTICS[item][0] = item;
    }

    public boolean hasChaotic() {
    int[] weapons = {
    18349, 18351, 18353, 18355, 18357, 18359, 18361
    };
    for (int g : weapons) {
    if (player.getEquipment().contains(g)) {
    return true;
    }
    }
    return false;
    }

    public void removeCharge(int object) {
    ItemDefinition def = ItemDefinition.forId(player.getEquipment().get(3).getId());
    if (getCharge(object) <= 0) {
    player.getEquipment().set(3, null);
    player.getInventory().addItem(getBrokenChaotic(object), 1);
    player.sendMessage("<col=ff0000>Your " + def.getName() + " has run out of charges!");
    return;
    }
    setCharge(object, getCharge(object) - 1);
    }

public static class ChaoticListener extends EventListener {

@Override
public void register(EventManager manager) {
	manager.registerInterfaceListener(149, this);
}

public boolean interfaceOption(final Player player, int interfaceId, int buttonId, int slot, int itemId, int opcode) {
	if (interfaceId != 149) {
		return false;
	}
		switch (itemId) {
			case 18349:
			if (opcode == 0) {
				player.sendMessage("Your Chaotic rapier has " + getChaoticManager().getCharge(0) + " charges left.");
			}
				return true;
			case 18351:
			if (opcode == 0) {
				player.sendMessage("Your Chaotic longsword has " + getChaoticManager().getCharge(1) + " charges left.");
			}
				return true;
		}
	return true;
}

}

}[/code]
